main.docTitle: Specification of Arrangements (Government of the Russian Federation Concerning Air Services) (Double Taxation) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Declaration under section 49
section.content: For the purposes of section 49 of the Ordinance it is declared that the arrangements referred to in section 2 have been made with the Government of the Russian Federation with a view to affording relief from double taxation in relation to income tax and tax of a similar character imposed by the laws of that Federation, and that it is expedient that those arrangements should have effect.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Arrangements specified
section.content: The arrangements mentioned in section 1 are in Article 12 of the Air Services Agreement between the Government of Hong Kong and the Government of the Russian Federation done in duplicate at Hong Kong on 22 January 1999 in the English and Russian languages as specified in the Schedule and having effect according to the tenor of that Agreement.

schedule.name: sch0
schedule.heading: Article 12 of the Air Services Agreement between the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People’s Republic of China and the Government of the Russian Federation

subsection.content: Income or profits derived from the operation of aircraft in international traffic by an airline of one Contracting Party, including participation in a pool service, a joint air transport operation or an international operating agency, which are subject to tax in the area of that Contracting Party, shall be taxable only in the area of that Contracting Party.
Capital and assets of an airline of one Contracting Party relating to the operation of aircraft in international traffic shall be taxable only in the area of that Contracting Party.

Gains from the alienation of aircraft operated in international traffic and movable property pertaining to the operation of such aircraft derived by an airline of one Contracting Party shall be taxable only in the area of that Contracting Party.
For the purposes of this Article:

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.def: the term “income or profits” includes revenues and gross receipts from the operation of aircraft for the carriage of persons, livestock, personal belongings, goods, mail or merchandise in international traffic including:

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: the charter or rental of aircraft;

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: the sale of tickets or similar documents, and the provision of services connected with such carriage, either for the airline itself or for any other airline; and

subparagraph.name: ii
subparagraph.content: interest on funds directly connected with the operation of aircraft in international traffic;

paragraph.name: b
b
paragraph.def: the term “airline of one Contracting Party” means, in the case of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, an airline incorporated and having its principal place of business in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region and, in the case of the Russian Federation, an airline the substantially ownership and effective control of which are vested in the Government of the Russian Federation or nationals of the Russian Federation;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.def: the term “competent authority” means, in the case of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region, the Commissioner of Inland Revenue or his authorised representative, or any person or body authorised to perform any functions at present exercisable by the Commissioner or similar functions, and, in the case of the Russian Federation, the Ministry of Finance of the Russian Federation or its authorised representative.

subsection.content: The competent authorities of the Contracting Parties shall, through consultation, endeavour to resolve by mutual agreement any disputes regarding the interpretation or application of this Article. Article 16 (Settlement of Disputes) shall not apply to any such dispute.

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: in the Russian Federation, for any tax year or period beginning on or after 1st January in the calendar year next following that in which this Article enters into force.

subsection.leadIn: Where either Contracting Party notifies to the other Contracting Party the termination of this Agreement under Article 18, this Article shall cease to have effect:

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: in the Russian Federation, for any tax year or period beginning on or after 1st January in the calendar year next following that in which the notice of termination is given.

subsection.content: This provisions of Article 18 (Termination) and Article 20 (Entry into Force) shall not applicable to this Article.

This Article shall cease to have effect in the event that an agreement for the avoidance of double taxation with respect to taxes on income, providing for similar exemptions to those in this Article, enters into force between the Contracting Parties.”.
